properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 7 at 3:00PM EST until November 7 at 4:00PM EST by National Weather Service
properties.description: At 300 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Indianapolis, moving northeast at 40 mph.
properties.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

properties.headline: Flood Watch issued November 7 at 2:00PM EST until November 8 at 8:00AM EST by National Weather Service
properties.description: Excessive rainfall possible. A Flood Watch means there is a potential for flooding based on current forecasts.
properties.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings.

title: Current watches, warnings, and advisories for Indiana
